title: Why Parables are True Stories with Prof. Michael Jahosky
description:
This is is my conversation with professor Michael Jahosky. Michael is a Tolkien scholar and author of the book "The Good News of the Return of the King: The Gospel in Middle Earth." We talk about Michael's life, the overview and thesis of Michael's book, and in which way (exactly) Middle Earth is a real place. I was delighted that I was able to talk with professor Jahosky and have learned much from him over the last year from his book and podcast. 

Michael's book (leave a review on Amazon for him!): https://www.amazon.com/Good-News-Return-King-Middle-earth/dp/1725263165/
Michael's podcast: https://anchor.fm/michael-t-jahosky

This was recorded on May 27th, 2022. 

This is episode 84 of my podcast. 

My Writing: https://coltonkirby.substack.com/

There is an audio version of my videos (on all podcast platforms): https://anchor.fm/coltonkirby

About Me: https://coltonkirby.substack.com/about
Twitter: https://twitter.com/_coltonkirby
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/officialcoltonkirby
Goodreads: https://www.goodreads.com/user/show/129883782-colton-kirby
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/officialcoltonkirby/
Pinterest: https://www.pinterest.com/coltonjkirby/_saved/
Odysee: https://odysee.com/@ColtonKirby
Books Wish List: https://docs.google.com/document/d/19GTqvKmd3Ter2WCpBwU2DkuD-Qse6xiLAqJFGZzWToo/edit?usp=sharing

If you want to financially support what I’m doing, you can give one-off donations here (thank you): https://www.paypal.me/ColtonKirby
